data.text: @UrFavritAsshole I keep my fingers crossed 🤞 that your baggage will be delivered soon. Kind regards, Derya
@UrFavritAsshole Hi there, we are very sorry to hear that your baggage didn´t arrive with you. Unfortunately, we cannot be of assistance in this case. Kind regards, Derya
@AnnaSabryan @UnitedAirlines_ [2/2] We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Derya

@AnnaSabryan @UnitedAirlines_ [1/2]Dear Anna, we regret to hear that your friend´s baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please contact our colleagues from Lost & Found via the number on your missing luggage report or send an email to viellos@austrian.com.

@KonstBre Hi Konstantin, es tut mir leid, dass du so lange warten musstest. Wir haben aktuell wieder sehr viele Anrufe. Bitte nenne uns deinen Buchungscode und dein Anliegen in einer DM. Wir sehen uns das gerne für dich an. Liebe Grüße, Derya
@kevinprak Hi Kevin, please send an email to our colleagues at specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text:

please send us your booking code and your seat preference.
We will try to reserve your seat.
Best regards, Alessandra

data.text: @rkrahenbuhl Hi Raquel, please accept our humble apologies for the delayed response. We have a high volume of incoming requests and queries thus response time maybe delayed. Best regards, Denis

@alimasonne Hi Alima, please accept our humble apologies for the long waiting time. We have a high volume of incoming requests and we are currently experiencing longer processing times. 
Best regards, Denis

@dmoney21684 @united Hi Derek, I don't have access to the baggage system and can't provide you with any updates. The correct contact is the number on your lost report, you may also track the status online. Best regards, Denis

data.text:
@CajouMutombo Hello, we are so sorry for the inconvenience and totally understand your frustration. Be assured that the luggage will be delivered as soon as possible. Meanwhile we suggest you to keep calling the contact
on your PIR and ask for an update. Best regards, Alessandra

@thepissqueen @JoshHead You can buy the necessary clothes/items for your stay, according to the general regulations, stating that for temporary loss of baggage, 100% for hygienic articles and 50% for clothes that were bought in the meantime, will be indemnified. Please keep all receipts. Kind regards

data.text:
@359WA @JFKairport @shlomy_jacobs @shloime_stein @Qaz21987315 Hello,
Thank you for your message.
Name changes are not permitted but in our regulations up to two typing errors are permitted.
Best regards, Alessandra

@akilathevirgo @HeathrowAirport @swissportNews @EagleAviation @DailyMailUK @lufthansa @BBCWorld Hello, The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status about your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC 
Best regards, Alessandra

data.text:
@BovenLaurens Hallo Laurenz,
Leider erhalten wir viele Anrufe, sodass die Wartezeiten länger als normal sind. Wir können Dich nur um Deine Geduld bitten. 
Gerne kannst du uns Deinen Buchungscode schicken und wir versuchen hier weiterzuhelfen.
Liebe Grüße
Alessandra

@muziolog Hi Iryna,
I am sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessa

@Bourguignon1970 Hi Cedric, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests.
@XenaBala Hi Xena, oh no, you got it wrong. It´s not necessary to make a change since this typing error will not cause you any difficulties when traveling. Kind regards, Derya

@JoshHead Hi Josh, we regret to hear that your baggage is still missing. Please accept my sincere apologies for all the inconvenience caused. Please send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

@svdiesnk Hi, our colleagues are doing their best to reunite each bag with its owner as it arrives. As soon as your bag has been located they will be in touch before delivery. We're sorry but the current situation means this is taking longer than normal. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@jennalewis94 @F1 Dear Jenna,
I would like to sincerely apologize for the flight cancellation. Kindly note that if you have incurred any expenses during the delay you may apply for compensation via the following link: 
https://t.co/lQ0BbSodym
Kind Regards, Alessandra

data.text: @kibristurku Hi, any extra luggage fees are non-refundable. You can find all the current covid travel requirements here: https://t.co/FR5dbcUumM Kind regards, Lyndsay

@arique_ahmed @ATH_airport @tmpatton19 @swissportNews Hi, we're sorry you have been having issues getting through. You can find all our international contacts here: https://t.co/0n0AgRRxAO Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@interim_dan Hello Danny,
the Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status about your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

@rartinmiggs  [2/2]  We try our best to avoid flight irregularities and delays. Please be assured that we never delay a flight without good reason. I hope that your future travels will be according to plan again.  Best regards, Denis
@rartinmiggs  [1/2] Hi Rartin, I am sorry to hear, that your flight os183 on July,6 was delayed for 14 minutes.

@evgeniyaruk  Hi Evgenia, I'm sorry that you're still missing your bag for more than 21 days. Please send your compensation request to my colleagues from Customer Relations via our online feedback form: https://t.co/FFefe711q1
Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@vivekagarwal0 Hi Vivek, we cannot tell you exactly when you will receive a response since your case has to be handled by various different departments. Still, we can assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you as soon as possible.
Best regards, Denis
@tatihene Hi Tati, please send your request via specialcases@austrian.com Our colleagues will be happy to assist. Kind regards, Chris

@GatoxXerran Hi, Gatox, We just retrieved your case and noticed that it has already been forwarded to our responsible department. Our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience and understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@Rkrahenbuhl @DisVicious1 Hi Raquel, I am sorry that your baggage is still missing. Please send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com Kind regards, Derya
@veitdengler Hi Veit, we are really sorry for any inconvenience caused by the loss of your daughter´s baggage. Please send an email to our colleagues at viellos@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya
@alancholesterol [2/2] If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com. https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc  Kind regards, Chris

@alancholesterol [1/2] Hi there, we apologize one more time for any inconvenience caused and kindly ask for your understanding that we, the social media team, can unfortunately not assist in this case.

@panikosgeor Hi there, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/QI0fSSoknS Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @drugsmisbruiker [2/2] We will be happy to help you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@drugsmisbruiker [1/2] Hi, we are very sorry you had a poor experience when trying to reach out to us. We understand your anger and that you have cause for criticism. Nevertheless, I would like to remind you of a polite tone. Please send us the respective booking code.

@Rory_MacF Dear Rory, unfortunately, if your rebooking needs to be done against a fee this can only be handled via phone or at the airport directly since we cannot accept payment instructions via social media or via email. Kind regards, D

@alinaee82526100 Hi Ali, please be informed that you can add an infant to an already existing reservation via phone only. We can therefore only ask you to contact our service center via phone one more time 
 https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @XenaBala Hi Xena, Unfortunately it is not possible to change the salutation after booking is completed but it is not relevant for the ticket. Kind regards, Chris

@MarietaVillalba Hi, I am sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status about your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessa

@Qualityresort Kind regards, Daphne

the flight was delayed because of the delayed incoming flight.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

Alessandra

Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR) which you will have received [1/2]

@ChrisPetra1 Hallo Chris, generell gibt as an vielen Flughäfen mit Austrian einen seperaten Check-in für Business Class Passagiere. Hier findest du nähere Informationen zum Flughafen Stuttgart: https://t.co/nA85SZjCeD Liebe Grüße, Daphne

urls.title: Check-in - Flughafen Stuttgart
urls.description: Bitte achten Sie darauf, dass Sie sich rechtzeitig vor Abflug am Check-in-Schalter Ihrer Fluggesellschaft einfinden. Die Check-in-Schalter öffnen je nach Airline zwischen 2 bis 3 Stunden vor dem Abflug. Die Öffnungszeit wird in der Regel beim Ticketkauf übermittelt. Kommen Sie mit dem Auto, der S-Bahn oder dem Bus zum Flughafen? Von überall haben Sie kurze Wege! Von der S-Bahn-Haltestelle haben Sie direkten Zugang zu den Terminals 1 und 3 über Aufzüge, Rolltreppen und Treppen. Von den Bus- und Pkw-Parkplät

data.text:
@Thom_Hofstetter @meierelias @cahen @FlixBus_DE Lieber Thomas,
vielen Dank für dein Feedback. Deinen Ärger können wir sehr gut nachvollziehen. Bitte wende dich an unsere Kollegen der Feedback Management Abteilung. Über dieses Fomular kannst du uns dein Anliegen zukommen lassen:  https://t.co/iHLF3V9WGS Viele Grüße,Alessandra

data.text: We fly to the Northern Lights and the desert sun🌎Marrakesh and Tromsø are brand new destinations in our winter schedule ✈️ For those who fancy sandy white beaches and crystal clear water in winter, we fly you non-stop to Cancún, Malé and Mauritius again🐚#winterschedule #outnow https://t.co/T1Vagv2rEs

data.text: @pedg Hi,I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered.Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR.There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.Kind regards, Christine
@MerissaKhurma Hi Merissa, we are sorry to hear you have been facing difficulties trying to contact us. Is there anything that we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@JordanNina91 Hi Nina, in case you need assistance with adding baggage please contact our internet helpdesk under ​+43 5 1766 3100. Kind regards, Christine
@awmcs Hi Andrew, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris

@charlotteclg Hi Charlotte,I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered.Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.Please contact the number on your PIR -Report. Kind regards, Christine
@JohnBalla Hi John, in case you need assistance please contact our internet helpdesk under ​+43 5 1766 3100 . Kind regards, Christine
@Moshchops_ Hi Nick, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@Fersukneda Hi Fer, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@bentleybrowning Hi Bentley, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com. https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris
@astimumm Hi Asti, bitte sende uns den Buchungscode in einer DM damit wir uns das genauer ansehen können. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@Jager_Yarosh Hi Egor, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. If your request has not been solved in the meantime, please send us your booking code and your required new flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@drugsmisbruiker Hi there, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Due to the current situation, all our lines are unfortunately very busy. If your request has still not been solved already please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Chris
@IPandzarova Hi Ivana, please contact in this case directly specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine
